name: Ext_R3_Task_reason
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.Task.reason for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Task.reason from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Task|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: A description or code indicating why this task needs to be performed.
element.comment: `Task.reasonCode` maps to R5 `Task.reason`. Has no type mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *).
